title: Luis Méndez (boxer)
text: Luis Méndez (born 1 December 1969) is a Uruguayan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201992%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1992%20Summer%20Olympics">1992 Summer Olympics</a>.
